languages.text: Magus picks one of his allies in 15 cells range. This ally receives only 50% of incoming damage for 1 round.
languages.translation_comment: Магус выбирает союзника в ренже 15 клеток. Этот союзник получает на 50% меньше урона до начала следующего хода Магуса.

traits.locale_text: Magus picks one of his allies in 15 cells range. This ally receives only 50% of incoming damage for 1 round.

languages.text: The Mental Tyrant selects an ally within a 15-cell radius. This ally's incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is reduced by −50% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Magus picks one of his allies in 15 cells range. This ally receives only 50% of incoming damage for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: The Mental Tyrant selects an ally in a 15-cell range. This ally has the incoming damage reduced by −50% for 1 round.
The Mental Tyrant selects an ally in a 15-cell range. This ally has the incoming damage reduced by −50% for 1 round.
The Mental Tyrant selects an ally within a 15-cell radius. This ally's incoming damage is reduced by −50% for 1 round.

languages.text: El tirano mental elige a un aliado en un radio de 15 casillas. El {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} recibido por el aliado se reduce un −50 % durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Mental Tyrant selects an ally within a 15-cell radius. This ally's incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is reduced by −50% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El tirano mental elige a un aliado en un radio de 15 casillas. El {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} recibido por el aliado se reduce un −50 % durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text: 精神的支配者は半径15セル内のセルを選択する。この味方に降りかかる{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}は、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間−50%減少する。
languages.original_text: The Mental Tyrant selects an ally within a 15-cell radius. This ally's incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is reduced by −50% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 精神的支配者は半径15セル内のセルを選択する。この味方に降りかかる{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}は、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間−50%減少する。

languages.text: 心灵暴君选择15格内的一名盟友，在接下来的一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内，该盟友受到的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低50%。
languages.original_text: The Mental Tyrant selects an ally within a 15-cell radius. This ally's incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is reduced by −50% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 心灵暴君选择15格内的一名盟友，在接下来的一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内，该盟友受到的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低50%。

languages.text: Der Mentaltyrann wählt einen Verbündeten in einem Radius von 15 Zellen aus. Dieser Verbündete erleidet 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang −50 % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.

languages.text: Le Tyran psychique sélectionne un allié dans un rayon de 15 cases. Les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} qu'il subit sont réduits de −50% pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: Ментальный тиран выбирает союзника на расстоянии до 15 клеток. Этот союзник получает на 50% меньше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} в течение 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

languages.text: Zihin Tiranı, 15 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki bir dost birimi seçer. Bu dost birime gelen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} %50 azalır. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
